description: The UpdateHITReviewStatus operation updates the status of a HIT. If the status is Reviewable, this operation can update the status to Reviewing, or it can revert a Reviewing HIT back to the Reviewable status.

parameters.name: HITId
parameters.description: The ID of the HIT to update.

parameters.name: Revert
parameters.description: Specifies how to update the HIT status. Default is False. Setting this to false will only transition a HIT from Reviewable to Reviewing Setting this to true will only transition a HIT from Reviewing to Reviewable.
